title: Frm\_4our
content:
i've recently created a new screen font,   
named '4our', please, take a look at it,   
and feel free to let me know, what you   
think about it...   
   
 [http://typography.formlos.net/frm\_4our.htm](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414175540/http:/typography.formlos.net/frm_4our.htm)   
   
thanks...
author: Dav

comments.content:
coole Sache! Ups sorry english forum \*g\*   
I like the '4our' but for me it is to small to read in longer text. Maybe it is a good Font for menus.   
   
Greatings from Germany over (wher is this forum hosted?) to Germany   
   
Jens

What a gorgeos font. i love it.   
i think the name could use some improvment though ![:)](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414175540im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)   
the S is very innovative, same goes for most of the other characters.
